thread.title: Dwayne Johnson reveals casting for film based on WWE star Paige and her family
thread.title_full: Dwayne Johnson reveals casting for film based on WWE star Paige and her family

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Dwayne Johnson reveals casting for film based on WWE star Paige and her family
text:
Dwayne Johnson reveals casting for film based on WWE star Paige and her family Her wrestling family's legacy will be explored in this exciting new project penned by Stephen Merchant Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now WWE's Paige practices her wrestling moves ahead of movie Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Dwayne Johnson is returning to wrestling in a unique way as he teams up with Stephen Merchant for a film based on the life of WWE superstar Paige - and the first cast members have been revealed. 
The Rock is known for his own impressive and iconic legacy in the industry, but now he's going to shine the spotlight on a very different and "gritty" story. 
Fighting With My Family was inspired by a documentary of the same name, which will follow Paige's influential family of professional wrestlers and their unique tale. Fighting With My Family will follow Paige's experience (Photo: WireImage) Dwayne Johnson and Stephen Merchant will team up (Photo: Instagram/stephenmerchant) 
It will tell the story of reformed gangster Ricky, his wife and fellow wrestler Julia, their son Zak and daughter Saraya - who went on to become Paige in WWE. 
Johnson has revealed Nick Frost and Lena Headey have joined the cast of the movie as her parents. Paige's family will feature in the movie (Photo: NBCUniversal) 
He wrote: "Our @sevenbucksprod welcomes to our #FightingWithMyFamily cast these two amazing actors. The brilliant/Bad Ass @iamlenaheadey and another Brit who's often mistaken as my twin, the genius @FriedGold (Nick Frost). Excited about these roles because Lena and Nick are playing Julia and Ricky - @realpaigewwe's mom and dad." 
Johnson will make a cameo in the WWE Studios and Film 4 project, as well as acting as executive producer, while The Office star Merchant will write, direct and executive produce. She is a former WWE Divas Champion (Photo: Getty Images Europe) https://www.instagram.com/p/BQOBYYvgN3j/embed 
It will tell the story of reformed gangster Ricky, his wife and fellow wrestler Julia, their son Zak and daughter Saraya - who went on to become Paige in WWE. 
"The Knightsâ€™ journey is a universal one that all families are familiar with. I relate to Saraya (Paige) and her wrestling family on such a personal level and it means so much that I can help tell their story," The Rock announce on Instagram. 
"Paige and I both know what it's like to come from a wrestling family who's had it's good and hard times. 
"Her and I have talked about this project for years now and we're all excited to bring her and her family's story to life." Like us on Facebook
